General.Name: ERSU Meyve ve Gida Sanayi AS
General.Description: Ersu Meyve ve Gida Sanayii A.S. manufactures and sells fruit concentrates and pulp juices in Turkey. The company offers concentrate products; puree concentrate; puree/pulp; NFC fruits; tomato juice; organic; fruit juices; fruit nectars; fruits juices drinks; and flavored drinks. It exports its products to 60 countries. It serves retail sales points, as well as military facilities, hospital cafes, schools and sport complexes, catering, etc. Ersu Meyve ve Gida Sanayii A.S. was founded in 1969 and is based in Konya, Turkey.
General.Address: Ziya GOekalp Mah.Irmak Sokak No:3, Konya, Turkey, 42310
